lv01_PlayDist.Wiki: play at the center of the boundary

lv12_PlayDist.Wiki: play at the center of the boundary

lv23_PlayDist.Wiki: play at the center of the boundary

lv34_PlayDist.Wiki: play at the center of the boundary

lv45_PlayDist.Wiki: play at the center of the boundary

tex_lv01_BorderDist.Wiki: Texture switching center (Texure LOD disabled at 0)

drawDist.Wiki: Maximum drawing distance. In the open, it will be used for the activation distance

drawFadeRange.Wiki: Fade distance from the maximum drawing distance to the actual disappearance

shadowFadeRange.Wiki: Fade distance from the maximum shadow drawing distance to the actual disappearance

motionBlur_BorderDist.Wiki: Distance at which motion blur is enabled

isPointLightShadowSrc.Wiki: Cast the shadow of a point light source

isDirLightShadowSrc.Wiki: Cast the shadow of a parallel light source

shadowDrawLodOffset.Wiki: LOD level offset value when drawing shadows

isTraceCameraXZ.Wiki: Follow the camera on the XZ plane (GR SEQ09242)

isSkydomeDrawPhase.Wiki: Set the drawing phase to the celestial sphere (GR SEQ09242)

LimtedActivate_BorderDist_forGrid.Wiki: Construction limit distance for open [m]. If the distance to the camera is less than this distance in the open, it will not be built. This is a function for distant view assets. -1: Function disabled (default)

zSortOffsetForNoFarClipDraw.AltName: Z Sort Offset for No Far Clip Draw
zSortOffsetForNoFarClipDraw.Wiki: If the distance from the camera is the same in the same drawing phase, the smaller translucent system is drawn in the foreground, and the opaque system is drawn in the larger value. The base point of the offset is the origin in the celestial sphere drawing phase. Other than that, it is mainly Model AABB. (GR SEQ09242)

shadowDrawAlphaTestDist.Wiki: Distance to perform alpha test when drawing shadow [m]

fowardDrawEnvmapBlendType.Wiki: Forward Drawing environment map Blend type

LBDrawDistScaleParamID.AltName: Load Balancer - Draw Distance Scale Param ID
LBDrawDistScaleParamID.Wiki: Load balancer drawing distance scale parameter ID
